tool_description: GreenCloud IaaS - Dedicated physical servers in France available in a minute.
name: GreenCloud
title: GreenCloud

api_list.name: getOfferList
api_list.description: More information on the current offers you can find on our website [https://greencloud.fr](https://greencloud.fr) Parameter `img` is a primary image to be used for each offer.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://greencloud.p.rapidapi.com/offer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greencloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://greencloud.p.rapidapi.com/offer"

headers = {

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getIaasItemState
api_list.description: Returns list of the IaaS item states (hardware / equipement). Please order items in state `1`
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://greencloud.p.rapidapi.com/iaas/item/state"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greencloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
